member.name: T:Npgsql.NpgsqlConnectionFactory
member.summary: Instances of this class are used to create DbConnection objects for Postgresql

member.name: M:Npgsql.NpgsqlConnectionFactory.CreateConnection(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a connection for Postgresql for the given connection string.

member.name: M:Npgsql.SqlGenerators.SqlBaseGenerator.GetColumnsForJoin(Npgsql.SqlGenerators.JoinExpression,Npgsql.SqlGenerators.ProjectionExpression,Npgsql.SqlGenerators.VisitedExpression)
member.summary: Given a join expression and a projection, fetch all columns in the projection that reference columns in the join.

member.name: M:Npgsql.SqlGenerators.SqlBaseGenerator.GetFromNames(Npgsql.SqlGenerators.InputExpression,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Given an InputExpression append all from names (including nested joins) to the list.

member.name: M:Npgsql.SqlGenerators.SqlBaseGenerator.GetReplacementColumn(Npgsql.SqlGenerators.JoinExpression,Npgsql.SqlGenerators.ColumnExpression)
member.summary: Get new ColumnExpression that will be used in projection that had it's existing columns moved. These should be simple references to the inner column

member.name: M:Npgsql.SqlGenerators.SqlBaseGenerator.AdjustPropertyAccess(Npgsql.SqlGenerators.ColumnExpression[],System.String)
member.summary: Every property accessed in the list of columns must be adjusted for a new scope

member.name: M:Npgsql.SqlGenerators.SqlBaseGenerator.DateAdd(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Data.Entity.Core.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression})
member.summary: PostgreSQL has no direct functions to implements DateTime canonical functions http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb738626.aspx http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb738626.aspx but we can use workaround: expression + number * INTERVAL '1 number_type' where number_type is the number type (days, years and etc)
